Online applications for the award of scholarship will be kept open in July every year. Processing will be done by the scholarship committee and selection of
awardees will be done by a committee consisting of senior faculty members, Director(s) of SRM IST. The decision of the scholarship committee would be
(i) A candidate is eligible for scholarship under any ONE category only.
(ii) Scholarships are not applicable for any NEET based program, Pharm. D & Pharm. D (PB) and any other programmes which the management may

general_info.vision: To emerge as a World – Class University in creating and disseminating knowledge and providing students a unique learning experience in Science, Technology, Medicine, Management and other areas of Scholarship that will best serve the world and for the betterment of mankind.
general_info.mission:
MOVE UP through international alliances and collaborative initiatives to achieve global excellence.
ACCOMPLISH A PROCESS to advance knowledge in a rigorous academic and research environment.
ATTRACT AND BUILD PEOPLE in a rewarding and an inspiring environment by fostering freedom, empowerment, creativity and innovation.
